LanguageData.AEXP_EggMoaFertilized.label: moa egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggMoaFertilized.description: A fertilized moa egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby moa. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggRockhopperPenguinFertilized.desc: A fertilized rockhopper penguin egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby rockhopper penguin. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
